Enums/OMIDPosition.html#/c:@E@OMIDPositi.name: OMIDPositionMidroll
Enums/OMIDPosition.html#/c:@E@OMIDPositi.abstract: The ad plays in the middle of video content, or between two separate content videos.

Enums/OMIDPosition.html#/c:@E@OMIDPositi.name: OMIDPositionStandalone
Enums/OMIDPosition.html#/c:@E@OMIDPositi.abstract: The ad plays independently of any video content.

Enums/OMIDInteractionType.html#/c:@E@OMI.name: OMIDInteractionTypeClick
Enums/OMIDInteractionType.html#/c:@E@OMI.abstract: The user clicked to load the ad’s landing page.

Enums/OMIDInteractionType.html#/c:@E@OMI.name: OMIDInteractionTypeAcceptInvitation
Enums/OMIDInteractionType.html#/c:@E@OMI.abstract: The user engaged with ad content to load a separate experience.

Enums/OMIDPlayerState.html#/c:@E@OMIDPla.name: OMIDPlayerStateMinimized
Enums/OMIDPlayerState.html#/c:@E@OMIDPla.abstract: The player is collapsed in such a way that the video is hidden.

Enums/OMIDPlayerState.html#/c:@E@OMIDPla.name: OMIDPlayerStateCollapsed
Enums/OMIDPlayerState.html#/c:@E@OMIDPla.abstract: The player has been reduced from its original size.

Enums/OMIDPlayerState.html#/c:@E@OMIDPla.name: OMIDPlayerStateExpanded
Enums/OMIDPlayerState.html#/c:@E@OMIDPla.abstract: The player has expanded from its original size.

Enums/OMIDFriendlyObstructionType.html#/.name: OMIDFriendlyObstructionMediaControls
Enums/OMIDFriendlyObstructionType.html#/.abstract: The friendly obstruction relates to interacting with a video (such as play/pause buttons).

Enums/OMIDFriendlyObstructionType.html#/.name: OMIDFriendlyObstructionCloseAd
Enums/OMIDFriendlyObstructionType.html#/.abstract: The friendly obstruction relates to closing an ad (such as a close button).

Enums/OMIDFriendlyObstructionType.html#/.name: OMIDFriendlyObstructionNotVisible
Enums/OMIDFriendlyObstructionType.html#/.abstract: The friendly obstruction is not visibly obstructing the ad but may seem so due to technical

Enums/OMIDFriendlyObstructionType.html#/.name: OMIDFriendlyObstructionOther
Enums/OMIDFriendlyObstructionType.html#/.abstract: The friendly obstruction is obstructing for any purpose not already described.

Enums/OMIDImpressionType.html#/c:@E@OMID.name: OMIDImpressionTypeDefinedByJavaScript
Enums/OMIDImpressionType.html#/c:@E@OMID.abstract: ImpressionType will be set by JavaScript session script.

Enums/OMIDImpressionType.html#/c:@E@OMID.name: OMIDImpressionTypeUnspecified
Enums/OMIDImpressionType.html#/c:@E@OMID.abstract: The integration is not declaring the criteria for the OMID impression.

Enums/OMIDImpressionType.html#/c:@E@OMID.name: OMIDImpressionTypeLoaded
Enums/OMIDImpressionType.html#/c:@E@OMID.abstract: The integration is using count-on-download criteria for the OMID impression.

Enums/OMIDImpressionType.html#/c:@E@OMID.name: OMIDImpressionTypeBeginToRender
Enums/OMIDImpressionType.html#/c:@E@OMID.abstract: The integration is using begin-to-render criteria for the OMID impression.

Enums/OMIDImpressionType.html#/c:@E@OMID.name: OMIDImpressionTypeOnePixel
Enums/OMIDImpressionType.html#/c:@E@OMID.abstract: The integration is using one-pixel criteria (when the creative has at least 1 visible pixel on

Enums/OMIDImpressionType.html#/c:@E@OMID.name: OMIDImpressionTypeViewable
Enums/OMIDImpressionType.html#/c:@E@OMID.abstract: The integration is using viewable criteria (1 second for display, 2 seconds while playing for

Enums/OMIDImpressionType.html#/c:@E@OMID.name: OMIDImpressionTypeAudible
Enums/OMIDImpressionType.html#/c:@E@OMID.abstract: The integration is using audible criteria (2 continuous second of media playback with non-zero

Enums/OMIDImpressionType.html#/c:@E@OMID.name: OMIDImpressionTypeOther
Enums/OMIDImpressionType.html#/c:@E@OMID.abstract: The integration’s criteria uses none of the above criteria for the OMID impression.

Enums/OMIDCreativeType.html#/c:@E@OMIDCr.name: OMIDCreativeTypeDefinedByJavaScript
Enums/OMIDCreativeType.html#/c:@E@OMIDCr.abstract: Creative type will be set by JavaScript session script.

Enums/OMIDCreativeType.html#/c:@E@OMIDCr.name: OMIDCreativeTypeHtmlDisplay
Enums/OMIDCreativeType.html#/c:@E@OMIDCr.abstract: Rendered in webview, verification code can be inside creative or in metadata.

Enums/OMIDCreativeType.html#/c:@E@OMIDCr.name: OMIDCreativeTypeNativeDisplay
Enums/OMIDCreativeType.html#/c:@E@OMIDCr.abstract: Rendered by native, verification code provided in metadata only.

Enums/OMIDCreativeType.html#/c:@E@OMIDCr.name: OMIDCreativeTypeVideo
Enums/OMIDCreativeType.html#/c:@E@OMIDCr.abstract: Rendered instream or as standalone video, verification code provided in metadata.

Enums/OMIDCreativeType.html#/c:@E@OMIDCr.name: OMIDCreativeTypeAudio
Enums/OMIDCreativeType.html#/c:@E@OMIDCr.abstract: Similar to video but only contains audio media.

Enums/OMIDOwner.html#/c:@E@OMIDOwner@OMI.name: OMIDJavaScriptOwner
Enums/OMIDOwner.html#/c:@E@OMIDOwner@OMI.abstract: The integration will send the event from a JavaScript session script.

Enums/OMIDOwner.html#/c:@E@OMIDOwner@OMI.name: OMIDNativeOwner
Enums/OMIDOwner.html#/c:@E@OMIDOwner@OMI.abstract: The integration will send the event from the native layer.

Enums/OMIDOwner.html#/c:@E@OMIDOwner@OMI.name: OMIDNoneOwner
Enums/OMIDOwner.html#/c:@E@OMIDOwner@OMI.abstract: The integration will not send the event.

Enums/OMIDErrorType.html#/c:@E@OMIDError.name: OMIDErrorGeneric
Enums/OMIDErrorType.html#/c:@E@OMIDError.abstract: The integration is publishing a “generic” error to verification scripts.

Enums/OMIDErrorType.html#/c:@E@OMIDError.name: OMIDErrorMedia
Enums/OMIDErrorType.html#/c:@E@OMIDError.abstract: The integration is publishing a “video” error to verification scripts.

Enums/OMIDOwner.html.name: OMIDOwner
Enums/OMIDOwner.html.abstract: Identifies which integration layer is responsible for sending certain events.

Enums/OMIDImpressionType.html.name: OMIDImpressionType
Enums/OMIDImpressionType.html.abstract: The criterion for an ad session’s OMID impression event.

Enums/OMIDPlayerState.html.name: OMIDPlayerState
Enums/OMIDPlayerState.html.abstract: List of supported media event player states.

Enums/OMIDInteractionType.html.name: OMIDInteractionType
Enums/OMIDInteractionType.html.abstract: List of supported media event user interaction types.

Classes/OMIDVASTProperties.html#/c:objc(.abstract: This method enables the media player to create a new VAST properties instance for non-skippable media ad placement.

Classes/OMIDSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)OMIDSDK(.abstract: The current semantic version of the integrated OMID library.

Classes/OMIDSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)OMIDSDK(.name: active
Classes/OMIDSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)OMIDSDK(.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether the OMID library has been activated.

Classes/OMIDSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)OMIDSDK(.abstract: Enables the integration partner to activate OMID.

Classes/OMIDPartner.html#/c:objc(cs)OMID.name: -initWithName:versionString:
Classes/OMIDPartner.html#/c:objc(cs)OMID.abstract: Initializes new partner instance providing both name and versionString.

Classes/OMIDMediaEvents.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -initWithAdSession:error:
Classes/OMIDMediaEvents.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Initializes media events instance for the associated ad session.

Classes/OMIDMediaEvents.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -startWithDuration:mediaPlayerVolume:
Classes/OMIDMediaEvents.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Notifies all media listeners that media content has started playing.

Classes/OMIDMediaEvents.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -firstQuartile
Classes/OMIDMediaEvents.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Notifies all media listeners that media playback has reached the first quartile.

Classes/OMIDMediaEvents.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -midpoint
Classes/OMIDMediaEvents.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Notifies all media listeners that media playback has reached the midpoint.

Classes/OMIDMediaEvents.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -thirdQuartile
Classes/OMIDMediaEvents.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Notifies all media listeners that media playback has reached the third quartile.

Classes/OMIDMediaEvents.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -complete
Classes/OMIDMediaEvents.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Notifies all media listeners that media playback is complete.

Classes/OMIDMediaEvents.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -pause
Classes/OMIDMediaEvents.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Notifies all media listeners that media playback has paused after a user interaction.

Classes/OMIDMediaEvents.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -resume
Classes/OMIDMediaEvents.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Notifies all media listeners that media playback has resumed after being paused.

Classes/OMIDMediaEvents.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -skipped
Classes/OMIDMediaEvents.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Notifies all media listeners that media playback has stopped as a user skip interaction.

Classes/OMIDMediaEvents.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -bufferStart
Classes/OMIDMediaEvents.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Notifies all media listeners that media playback has stopped and started buffering.

Classes/OMIDMediaEvents.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -bufferFinish
Classes/OMIDMediaEvents.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Notifies all media listeners that buffering has finished and media playback has resumed.

Classes/OMIDMediaEvents.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -volumeChangeTo:
Classes/OMIDMediaEvents.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Notifies all media listeners that the media player volume has changed.

Classes/OMIDMediaEvents.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -playerStateChangeTo:
Classes/OMIDMediaEvents.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Notifies all media listeners that media player state has changed.

Classes/OMIDMediaEvents.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -adUserInteractionWithType:
Classes/OMIDMediaEvents.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Notifies all media listeners that the user has performed an ad interaction.

Classes/OMIDAdSessionContext.html#/c:obj.abstract: Initializes a new ad session context providing reference to partner and a list of

Classes/OMIDAdSessionContext.html#/c:obj.abstract: Initializes a new ad session context providing reference to partner and web view where

Classes/OMIDAdSessionConfiguration.html#.name: -initWithCreativeType:impressionType:impressionOwner:mediaEventsOwner:isolateVerificationScripts:error:
Classes/OMIDAdSessionConfiguration.html#.abstract: Create new ad session configuration supplying the owner for both the impression and media

Classes/OMIDAdSession.html#/c:objc(cs)OM.name: configuration
Classes/OMIDAdSession.html#/c:objc(cs)OM.abstract: The AdSession configuration is used for check owners.

Classes/OMIDAdSession.html#/c:objc(cs)OM.name: mainAdView
Classes/OMIDAdSession.html#/c:objc(cs)OM.abstract: The native view which is used for viewability tracking.

Classes/OMIDAdSession.html#/c:objc(cs)OM.name: -initWithConfiguration:adSessionContext:error:
Classes/OMIDAdSession.html#/c:objc(cs)OM.abstract: Initializes new ad session supplying the context.

Classes/OMIDAdSession.html#/c:objc(cs)OM.name: -start
Classes/OMIDAdSession.html#/c:objc(cs)OM.abstract: Notifies all verification providers that the ad session has started and ad view tracking will begin.

Classes/OMIDAdSession.html#/c:objc(cs)OM.name: -finish
Classes/OMIDAdSession.html#/c:objc(cs)OM.abstract: Notifies all verification providers that the ad session has finished and all ad view tracking will stop.

Classes/OMIDAdSession.html#/c:objc(cs)OM.name: -addFriendlyObstruction:purpose:detailedReason:error:
Classes/OMIDAdSession.html#/c:objc(cs)OM.abstract: Adds friendly obstruction which should then be excluded from all ad session viewability calculations.

Classes/OMIDAdSession.html#/c:objc(cs)OM.name: -removeAllFriendlyObstructions
Classes/OMIDAdSession.html#/c:objc(cs)OM.abstract: Utility method to remove all registered friendly obstructions.

Classes/OMIDAdSession.html#/c:objc(cs)OM.abstract: Notifies the ad session that an error has occurred.

Classes/OMIDAdEvents.html#/c:objc(cs)OMI.abstract: Initializes ad events instance associated with the supplied ad session.

Classes/OMIDAdEvents.html#/c:objc(cs)OMI.name: -impressionOccurredWithError:
Classes/OMIDAdEvents.html#/c:objc(cs)OMI.abstract: Notifies the ad session that an impression event has occurred.

Classes/OMIDAdEvents.html#/c:objc(cs)OMI.name: -loadedWithError:
Classes/OMIDAdEvents.html#/c:objc(cs)OMI.abstract: Notifies the ad session that display loaded event has occurred.

Classes/OMIDAdEvents.html#/c:objc(cs)OMI.name: -loadedWithVastProperties:error:
Classes/OMIDAdEvents.html#/c:objc(cs)OMI.abstract: Notifies the ad session that video/audio loaded event has occurred.

Classes/OMIDAdEvents.html.name: OMIDAdEvents
Classes/OMIDAdEvents.html.abstract: Ad event API enabling the integration partner to signal to all verification providers when key events have occurred.

Classes/OMIDAdSession.html.name: OMIDAdSession
Classes/OMIDAdSession.html.abstract: Ad session API enabling the integration partner to notify OMID of key state relating to viewability calculations.

Classes/OMIDAdSessionConfiguration.html.name: OMIDAdSessionConfiguration
Classes/OMIDAdSessionConfiguration.html.abstract: The ad session configuration supplies the owner for both the impression and video events.

Classes/OMIDAdSessionContext.html.name: OMIDAdSessionContext
Classes/OMIDAdSessionContext.html.abstract: Provides the ad session with details of the partner and whether to an HTML,

Classes/OMIDMediaEvents.html.name: OMIDMediaEvents
Classes/OMIDMediaEvents.html.abstract: This provides a complete list of native media events supported by OMID.

Classes/OMIDPartner.html.name: OMIDPartner
Classes/OMIDPartner.html.abstract: Details about the integration partner which will be supplied to the ad session.

Classes/OMIDSDK.html.name: OMIDSDK
Classes/OMIDSDK.html.abstract: This application level class will be called by all integration partners to ensure OM SDK has been activated before calling any other API methods.

Classes/OMIDScriptInjector.html.name: OMIDScriptInjector
Classes/OMIDScriptInjector.html.abstract: Utility class which enables integration partners to use a standard approach for injecting OM SDK JS into the served tag HTML content.

Classes/OMIDVASTProperties.html.name: OMIDVASTProperties
Classes/OMIDVASTProperties.html.abstract: This object is used to capture key VAST properties so this can be shared with all registered verification providers.

Classes/OMIDVerificationScriptResource.h.name: OMIDVerificationScriptResource
Classes/OMIDVerificationScriptResource.h.abstract: Details about the verification provider which will be supplied to the ad session.
